## Lesson goals and objectives

### Learning goals

<!--
High-level "big picture" objectives of the learning process.
This should be no more than 3 bullet points.
-->

- Describe what containers are and how they facilitate reproducibility.
- Demonstrate how containers can be used on JADE.
- Demonstrate how to create and run new containers.

### Learning objectives

<!--
More concrete and measurable outputs.
This can range from 3 to 8 bullet points.
-->

- Execute commands reproducibly within containers.
- Create and use your own containers.
- Run interactive containers as Slurm jobs.
